channel.title: [PI]HD + Full Screen
channel.description: Hi, is it possible to load HD on 317 PI :D? Also... Im using Rune-Live for a base, it has fullscreen already in it, because i looked in cache it says Fullscreen folder, but no setting, can some 1 tell me if it even has fullscreen and if yes can u set it up :I waiting ages for fullscreen. :D Thanks

item.title: [PI]HD + Full Screen
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If by HD you mean particles, higher-poly models, and higher quality textures, then the answer is yes. However, since none of those things exist in the 317 client, you will have to add all of the features yourself.

Read full topic
